definitions.definition: Use of acerbic language to mock or convey contempt , often using irony and (in speech) often marked by overemphasis and sneering.
An individual act of the above.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Use of acerbic language to mock or convey contempt , often using irony and (in speech) often marked by overemphasis and sneering.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An individual act of the above.
